issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: A simple example pipes job gets stuck without making any progress. The AM is launched but the maps do not make any progress.
fields.summary: Pipes jobs stuck without making progress

comments.body: Fixes the issue with pipes and also adds the configs to YarnConfiguration, so that we dont hard code it into the classes.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12496041/MAPREDUCE-3044.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    -1 findbugs.  The patch appears to introduce 1 new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/815//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/815//artifact/trunk/hadoop-mapreduce-project/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-mapreduce-client-core.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/815//console

This message is automatically generated.
Updated patch so that we use MRJobConfig and also made changes for TaskLog to return original hadoop.log.dir if present.
Update patch, to reverse the if clause in case anyone ends up setting hadoop.log.dir in yarn.

-1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12496047/MAPREDUCE-3044.patch
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    -1 tests included.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    +1 findbugs.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in .

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/817//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/817//console
